title: Zootopia 2
overview: After cracking the biggest case in Zootopia's history, rookie cops Judy Hopps and Nick Wilde find their partnership isn't as solid as they thought when Chief Bogo orders them to join the Partners in Crisis counseling program. title: Black Phone 2
studio_distributor: Blumhouse Productions, Universal Pictures, Crooked Highway, Divide / Conquer
overview: Four years after escaping The Grabber, Finney Blake is struggling with his life after captivity.
